author: Kristina Wong
title: Tom Cotton, Dan Crenshaw Introduce Bill to Allow Americans to Sue China for Coronavirus Damages
description: Cotton and Crenshaw introduced a bill that would allow Americans to sue China in federal court for damages caused by the Wuhan Virus.
content:
Sen. Tom Cotton (R-AK) and Rep. Dan Crenshaw (R-TX) introduced a bill on Thursday that would allow Americans to sue China in federal court for “death, injury, and economic harm caused by the Wuhan Virus.”
“By silencing doctors and journalists who tried to wa… [+2804 chars]
